desc: Welcome to Pamper Me! AND Muddy Buddies NZ! The home of Shine Bright! We handmake bath and body products for Humans, Dogs & Horses in Wanganui, New Zealand. Our products are handmade in small batches to ensure the quality of the end result remains high, and our customers (Fur and Non Fur) pampered

layout.text:
Welcome to Pamper Me! & Muddy Buddies! The home of handmade bath and body products in Wanganui, New Zealand. Our products are handmade in small batches to ensure the quality of the end result remains high, and our customers remain pampered.
Our shipping costs are set at the following:
New Zealand: Spend over $75 for free postage or $8 for orders up to $74.99
Everywhere else in the World: Please contact me directly for shipping prices
